original_title: ECW Holiday Hell '95: The New York Invasion
overview: Cactus Jack faces Sabu in an Extreme Death Match main event. As Raven looks to get his hands on gold by challenging The Sandman for the ECW World Heavyweight Title, Tommy Dreamer looks to plow through Stevie Richards and Blue Meanie to get his hands on Raven. Public Enemy is in for a painful surprise when an infamous duo returns. All this and more!
tagline: Live at Lost Battalion Hall its ECW Holiday Hell
title: ECW Holiday Hell '95: The New York Invasion
